imdb.title: Kokoro Library
imdb.plot: Deep in the mountains lies a library with the same name as one of its caretakers, Kokoro. With her sisters Inna and Aruto, she strives to uphold the best characteristic of a librarian -- to help users with all her heart. Join youn...

episodes.title: I'll Become a Librarian
episodes.plot: Kokoro begins her first day working as a librarian alongside her two older sisters Aruto and Iina.

episodes.title: What I Can Do At This Moment
episodes.plot: The library receives the latest book by Kokoro's favorite author, Himemiya Kirin. Seeking to attract visitors to the isolated library, the sisters distribute a flyer to the town

episodes.title: The Secret Ms. Kirin
episodes.plot: Kokoro wins a contest to meet Himemiya Kirin, her favorite author.

episodes.title: A Librarian's Motto
episodes.plot: The sisters take a working holiday at a library by the beach. Kokoro befriends Fukami Misato, a sickly girl from a rich family and a relative of Akaha.

episodes.title: The Targeted Library
episodes.plot: The phantom thief Funny Tortoise announces that he will steal a locked book from the library.

episodes.title: The Comparoid Librarian
episodes.plot: Kokoro leaves by train to undertake librarian training, where she meets a librarian named June.

episodes.title: The Day Kokoro is Gone
episodes.plot: Iina badly misses Kokoro while she is away taking librarian training, and even dresses Akaha in Kokoro's uniform to serve as a temporary replacement Kokoro.

episodes.title: I Want to See My Mom
episodes.plot: A quiet girl named Inoue Hikari arrives at Kokoro Library.

episodes.title: A Miracle
episodes.plot: Hikari's librarian training at Kokoro Library continues, but Kokoro is worried by news that Hikari's mother is undergoing major surgery.

episodes.title: The Library May Disappear
episodes.plot: The sisters excitedly prepare the library for a visit from the mayor, but learn that she intends to cancel the town's funding for the library due to lack of visitors.

episodes.title: Jordy's Diary
episodes.plot: A squad of soldiers defending the town are dismayed when their request for reinforcements is met by a single conscript: Sant Jordi, whose positive attitude soon improves their morale.

episodes.title: Kokoro Aruto Iina
episodes.plot: Kokoro and her sisters come to terms with the library's pending closure.

episodes.title: Kokoro Library's Winter
episodes.plot: The sisters dress in Santa costumes and deliver books to the town.
